Text: David Duke the former KKK wizard and hate monger? No, thanks... Minority spokesman for very small like-minded audiences, thank god...

For your information, I'm no jew boy and I don't agree with Israel's policy but many jews don't also, putting all jews in the same rotten bag is one of the cheap tricks by rabid hate-mongers like Duke and yourself, fortunately you are all part of a fringe minority condemned to be laughed at and despised by all true and fair-minded Americans.

Thanks, Mr. Duke. How Nations Die is brilliant. Very well done. 

Thanks for your dedication to God and humanity!
